Provide the Item/Role Tasks specific information here
  1. Briefly describe scope and tasks and provide information about the skills and experience needed to cover them
    1. must-have skills
    2. nice-to-have skills
    3. experience
  2. Describe the deliverable(s) and provide ‘project context information'

State the expert/candidate here if already known.

In case you want to purchase an external,
then please provide the following details in this field.
EWFC guidance on what makes a good delivery scope description is as follows:

General Statement of Purpose/Detailed scope of work
What will be done by the Freelancer during the assignment
Output – What will exist or have been completed once the project is done

Deliverables
Tasks that are to be done by the worker
Output / work product that are expected to be delivered

Acceptance Criteria
How will SAP determine if the deliverables are an acceptable standard

Process for managing scope changes
These should be documented and added as an update to the scope and should not be done ad-hoc verbally during the assignment.

Details on task coordination
How will the order and priority of tasks be managed?
Who will decide when to do a task.
